entity.name: TestEntity
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT S.ID, S.Name as Seller, C.Name as City, Convert(varchar, Latitude) + ',' + Convert(varchar, Longitude) as LatLng FROM Seller S INNER JOIN SubCategorySeller SCS on S.ID = SCS.Seller_ID INNER JOIN SubCategory SC on SC.ID = SCS.SubCategory_ID INNER JOIN Location L on S.HeadLocationId = L.ID AND L.Deleted is null INNER JOIN City C on C.ID = L.CityId WHERE S.Deleted is null

entity.name: subcategories
entity.query: select name AS SubCategories from SubCategory SC inner join SubCategorySeller SCS on SC.ID = SCS.SubCategory_ID where SCS.Seller_ID ='${TestEntity.ID}'
